backend/main.mo: Actor implementing player, team, match, profile, and auction management with access control and extended auction state including fixedIncrement.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding fixedIncrement to existing auction state by transforming stored auctions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for all frontend files involved in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH colors for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the app with dark mode enabled and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout with optional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Admin header with Internet Identity login/logout controls and navigation actions.
Provides UI to create matches, edit match results, and list existing matches using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Implements auction flow for an individual player including starting auctions, placing bids, and finalizing results.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: Handles creating, editing, deleting, assigning players, and launching player auctions with dialog-driven UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for users to enter and save their profile name via a simple form.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Displays players purchased by a specific team with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Renders team header with purse info, navigation, and login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: Manages teams including creation, purse updates, player assignments, and removal using multiple dialogs.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Displays match cards, loading and error states, and filters matches by team ID with win/loss indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating players, teams, matches, and user profiles via the backend actor with authâ€‘aware error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing players, teams, and matches, using identity and profile data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login screen using Internet Identity and redirects users based on their profile role.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: React page showing team dashboards, loading states, team selection, purse details, and match/player info using multiple hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning values from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing auction features, requirements, state versions, and pending requests for fixed bid increments.
